scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-modules && npm run build-client && npm run install-server
scripts.install-modules: vue add vuetify && npm install -g @vue/cli @vue/cli-service @vue/cli-plugin-babel @vue/cli-plugin-unit-mocha vue-cli-plugin-vuetify @vue/cli-plugin-e2e-cypress
scripts.build-client: cd ./client && npm install && npm run build
